name: Wes Kaplan
bio: A distinguished marketing and sales leader with a deep expertise in fintech and digital assets, previously leading Cointelegraph as CEO. His background includes roles at JP Morgan and BNY Mellon, showcasing his ability to foster growth in both startups and major financial institutions.

name: Morgan Richards
bio: He leads in advancing Synthetic Biology through DeSci initiatives, focusing on tokenomics and product innovation within an online ecosystem for research translation. With a rich blend of expertise from AI to Decentralised Science, he is dedicated to leveraging web3 and DeFi technologies to enhance global biotechnology research and impact.

name: Lili Eva Bartha
bio: She is the founder of GN3RA and an award-winning Digital Fashion and XR expert, innovating in the creation of digital outfits for virtual realms. With a rich background in fashion design and applied mathematics, she advocates for easier access to digital content creation, drawing from extensive experience in fashion, gaming, and academia to empower digital self-expression.
